page.title: 15INTERVIEW WITH SINGLE PARENT
page.content: This single parent is a 26 year old woman living in Birkdale.She said that although she had difficulty in supporting herself and her child immediately after her husband left her,she manages better now.She goes out to work and her mother looks after her child because she cannot afford a childminder.She counts herself lucky to have a job but dislikes her employer.She works as a secretary and has been passed over for promotion several times whilst the men have always been promoted.She dislikes being asked if she has children because when she says yes she can see prospective employers mentally dismissing her,even in this supposed age of equality.She hates this attitude;even though she has a child she knows she would be good enough for the job but is never given a chance.
